entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.4°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -4.4°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening then changing to rain mixed with snow and then changing to a few flurries before morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the morning then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along the coast. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along the coast. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022
